item.title: Overflowing bins at 44 Kynaston Road, 8th June
item.description:
The bins for 44 Kynaston Road are digusting and overflowing. There is rubbish all over the street.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kynaston Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Noise pollution believed to come from overground tracks, 8th June
item.description:
A constant beeping noice has been ongoing since the afternoon yesterday. I believe that the beeping sound comes from the overground tracks, just below 83 Dalston Lane. I have already reported this on 01/04, 22/04.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Dalston Lane, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tip, 8th June
item.description:
Dumped mattress top of high grove near 291 bus stop corner of voce road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Grove, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti, 8th June
item.description:
Grafitti on electrical green box close to East Rochester Way, top corner of Crown Woods Way (opposite Eltham Cemetery). First spotted grafitti late May. More grafitti has been added since. It seems to increase over the school holidays and summer months. Perhaps a sign can be placed nearby.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 145, Orchard Rise West, Falconwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dirty needles and drug related collateral, 8th June
item.description:
Dirty needles found in the stairwell while walking down this morning. Thank you for taking a look.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hertford Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large TV left outside my flat, 8th June
item.description:
I have been experiencing a lot of fly tipping outside my flat the last few weeks. There is now a TV outside my front door since yesterday afternoon. Could this be removed?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 39, Pellatt Road, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There is still a dead fox on central resevation, 8th June
item.description:
There is still a dead fox on the central resevation in Westhorne ave...I reported one and it was picked up this is a second one just a few yards away just about level with the large road sign on the houses side.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westhorne Avenue, Well Hall, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several bags of rubbish split open & scattered about, 8th June
item.description:
Rubbish all over the pavements from several bags dumped in Galliard Rd N9 on the other side of the road to the phone box, which is another target for dumpers.. This is a regular dump site, about time this was stopped. Camera needed to catch and fine culprits. This will have a positive effect
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 457, Galliard Road, Ponders End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish left by 20 bromley grove over the street, 8th June
item.description:
Rubbish has been put out at 20 bromley grove outside of the bins which foxes have gotten into and now there is rubbish and glass everywhere

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Bromley Grove, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet
